message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $90.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I am willing to pay $85 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $92.50.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to offer $87.5 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm willing to offer it to you for $95.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I am willing to pay $90 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still trying to find a mutually beneficial price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $97.50.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiation, Alice. I am willing to pay $92.5 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still trying to find a good deal. I'm willing to offer it to you for $98.
